# Modulation of Recovery from Neonatal Hyperoxic Lung Injury by Sex as a Biological Variable

This analysis is divided in two parts.

- PND 1 and PND 21 Room Air samples. Here we are looking for the differences bewteen male and female at base conditions.
- PND 21 Male Hyperoxia vs Room Air and Female Hyperoxia vs Room Air. Here we are looking for the differences between hyperoxia and room air within each sex at PND 21.
